H0.text: Amoeba has starch granules in its cytoplasm.

H1.text: Euglena has starch granules in its cytoplasm.

H2.text: Paramecium is a protist that has starch granules in its cytoplasm.

H3.text: Volvox is a protist that has starch granules in its cytoplasm.

A4.text: Euglena chloroplasts contain pyrenoids, which synthesize paramylon, a form of starch energy storage.
